about_the_game:
Embark on a journey into the dark folklore of Krampus, the malevolent Christmas demon. Face your fears, team up with a friend in online co-op, or brave the nightmare alone in single-player mode.

🌲 Unleash the Horror of Krampus: Dive into the sinister realm of Krampus, where every shadow conceals a potential threat. Navigate through twisted levels filled with locked doors, hidden paths and the relentless pursuit of the horned beast.

👥 Online Co-op Thrills: Team up with a friend to increase your chances of survival. Communication and teamwork are key as you strategize and outsmart Krampus together. Can you rely on your friend when the terror unfolds, or will you become Krampus' next victim?

🔦 Single Player Desperation: Feel the isolation and intensity as you navigate the treacherous levels alone. Every creak, every rustle, and every distant growl will keep you on the edge of your seat. Can you escape the clutches of Krampus solo, or will the darkness consume you?

🔪 Survival of the Fittest: Krampus is relentless, cunning, and always one step behind. Use your surroundings wisely, find hidden shortcuts, and stay one step ahead to survive. Your wits and reflexes will be your greatest allies.

🕹️ Immersive Sound Design: The haunting sounds of Krampus' footsteps, the distant jingling of chains, and the echoes of your own terrified breath will immerse you in a world of terror. Plug in your headphones, turn off the lights, and brace yourself for an unforgettable horror experience.

💀 Face the Darkness, Escape the Nightmare: "The Krampus" is not for the faint of heart. Do you have the courage to confront the Christmas demon and escape the nightmarish depths of his lair?

content_descriptors.notes: Krampus kidnaps children, but there is no violence depicted against the children. There are skeletons and corpses only of adults in the game.

short_description: A realistic third-person horror set in the 1800s. Play as brave children escaping Krampus. Navigate diverse levels, including Krampus' workshop and a haunting Victorian home. Choose to brave the nightmare solo or team up with a friend in online co-op. Run, hide, and find your way to survival
